    • Method Detail

      • repopulatePaymentItems

        public void repopulatePaymentItems(DirectBillPmntAcctRole role,
                          DirectBillPmntAccts relevantAccounts,
                          DistributionLimitType limitFilter)
        Description copied from class: DirectBillPaymentView
        Based on the given settings, recreate the payment items, and re-allocate the distribution amounts on the items. This will preserve any manual overrides made against any invoice items.
        Overrides:
        repopulatePaymentItems in class DirectBillPaymentView
        Parameters:
        role - What relationship between the Account and the InvoiceItems defines which items to include on the payment.
        relevantAccounts - What Accounts to look at for eligible items.
        limitFilter - What are valid statuses of Invoices to draw from for eligible items.
